title: Vodafone type
content:
Is vodafone type a custom design?  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456981462/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803100432/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456981462/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456981462/")

thanks
author: fermello78

comments.content:
The company does use a custom Dalton Maag typeface

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case\_studies/vodafone.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803100432/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case_studies/vodafone.html "http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case\_studies/vodafone.html")

not sure about the (different) one used for the logo, though.
